description:
· Two Detectives, One Target: Control two detectives with unique personalities and complementary skills. Work as a team to solve puzzles, collect evidence, and follow clues that will take you closer to the truth.

· Memorable Characters: Interact with a wide variety of characters, from scheming suspects to unreliable informants. Make important decisions that will influence the course of the investigation and the fate of the city.

· A Growing Plot: Discover a plot that goes beyond what you imagined. As you progress through the story, you will discover additional layers of intrigue and betrayal that will keep your attention guessing.

· Detailed Graphics: Enjoy stunning graphics and a captivating soundtrack that will fully immerse you in the world of 'Shadows in the Big Apple'.

· Find the Truth: Your ability to solve the case and make important decisions will determine whether you can expose the plot and save the city you love so much.
name: Shadows of Truth
